hero.title: Amilax
hero.tagline: Daawooyin Tayo Leh, Si Daacadnimo Leh Loo Siiyo
hero.description: In ka badan 3 sano, qoysasku waxay nagu kalsoonaan jireen daawooyin dhabta ah, talo farmashiyeed, iyo daryeelka — maalin walba.

services.subtitle: Waxaan Bixinaa
services.title: Adeegyadeenna
services.description: Wax kasta oo aad farmashiyaha ka rabto — qol keliya.
services.prescriptionMedicinesDesc: Daawooyin dhabta ah oo ay bixiyaan farmasiyahano aqoon u leh.
services.prescriptionUploadDesc: Noo soo dir qoraalkaaga WhatsApp-ka noo soo dir waxaanan kuugu diyaarinay.
services.healthConsultationDesc: La hadal farmasiyahanadeenna si ay talo kuugu siiyaan.
services.localDeliveryDesc: Hel daawooyinkaaga oo laguu keeno gurigaaga.
services.quickServiceDesc: Waqti yar oo sugitaan ah oo nidaam wanaagsan leh.
services.genuineProductsDesc: Alaab walba waxaa laga keenaa qaybiyayaasha la ogol yahay — caddaalad ah.

ctaBand.title: Daawad u Baahan Tahay? Fariin Kaliya Ayuu Kaa Fog Yahay
ctaBand.description: Noo soo dir qoraalkaaga ama weydii helitaanka — WhatsApp degdeg ayaan uga jawaabnaa.

medicines.subtitle: Daawooyinkeenna
medicines.title: Qaybaha Daawada
medicines.description: Baadho qaybaha aan kaydsanno. Si aad u hubiso helitaanka ama aad weyddiiso daawad gaar ah, taabo Weydii.
medicines.noResults: Qayb la mid ah ma jirto
medicines.noResultsHint: Waxaa laga yaabaa inaan hayno waxaad u baahan tahay — na weydii si toos ah.
medicines.disclaimer: Ogow: Daawooyinka kore tusaalooyin kaliya ayay yihiin, lagamana yaabo inay muujiyaan kaydka hadda. Helitaanka, fadlan nala soo xiriir WhatsApp. Daawooyin qoraal dhakhtar u baahan waxaa kaliya la siin doonaa kadib markii farmashiyihii xaqiijiyo.
medicines.cantFind: Ma heli kartid waxaad u baahan tahay?

about.subtitle: Ku Saabsan Amilax Pharmaceuticals
about.title: Farmashiye Ku Dhisan
about.description: U adeegeynta bulshadeenna daawooyin dhabta ah, dhaqan wanaagsan, iyo daryeel caafimaadkaaga hor mariya.
about.storyP1: Amilax Pharmaceuticals waxaa loo aasaasay caqiido fudud: qoys walba wuxuu xaq u leeyahay daawooyin dhabta ah, jaban, farmashiye ay ku kalsoon yihiin. 3 sannadood ee la soo dhaafay, waxaan ku shaqaynnay inaan kalsoonidaas kasbanno — hal qoraal dhakhtar markiiba.
about.storyP2: Ma samaynno ballanqaado waaweyn. Taa beddelkeeda, waxaan diiradda saarnaa waxa muhiimka ah — in la kaydiyo alaab dhabta ah, in farmasiyahanadu hubiyaan qoraal kasta, in macaamiil kastana lala dhaqmo si daacadnimo iyo xushmad leh.
about.storyP3: Ha ahaato daawooyin caadi ah, caawin fahamka qoraalka dhakhtarka, ama farmashiye furan marka aad u baahato, Amilax halkan ayuu joogaa — maalin walba ilaa habeenka badh.
values: Farmashiye ruqsad leh oo dawladda diiwaangelisay
Farmasiyahano aqoon leh ayaa xaqiijiya qoraal kasta
Daawooyin kaliya laga keeno qaybiyayaasha la ogol yahay
Siinta daacadnimada leh iyo qiimo daah-furnaan
Asturnaanta bukaan-socodku had iyo jeer la ilaaliyaa
Furan maalin walba, 9 subaxnimo ilaa habeen badh
about.genuineMedicinesDesc: Alaab kasta farmashiyaheenna waxaa si toos ah looga keenaa qaybiyayaasha la ogol yahay.
about.ethicalDispensingDesc: Farmasiyahanadeenu waxay hubiyaan qoraalka ka hor siinta. Marnaba daawad ma beddelno adiga laguuma sheegin.
about.availableDesc: Waxaan furannahay maalin walba 9 subaxnimo ilaa habeen badh maxaa yeelay caafimaadku jadwal ma raaco.
about.commitmentDesc: Waxaan ku amminay in si daah-furnaan ah loo shaqeeyo. Halkan waxaad ka arki doontaa — iyo waxa aadan marnaba arki doonin — Amilax.
promiseItems: Daawooyin dhabta ah oo laga keeno qaybiyayaal ruqsad leh
Farmasiyahe ayaa xaqiijiya qoraalka ka hor siinta
Qiimo daah-furnaan ah oo aan kharash qarsoon lahayn
Adeeg xushmad leh oo sir-ilaalin ah
dontDoItems: Siinta daawooyin qoraal dhakhtar la'aan ah
about.ctaDesc: Farmasiyahanadeenna way kaa caawini karaan. Nala soo xiriir wakhti kasta — waxaan furannahay maalin walba ilaa habeen badh.

prescription.subtitle: Qoraalka Dhakhtarka & Weydiin
prescription.title: Soo Dir Qoraalka Dhakhtarkaaga
prescription.description: Noo soo dir qoraalkaaga waxaanan kuugu diyaarinay daawooyinkaaga. Sidoo kale waxaad weydiin kartaa helitaanka daawad kasta.
prescription.step1Desc: Sawir cad ka qaad qoraalkaaga dhakhtarka ama dooro sawir/PDF hore oo taleefankaaga ku jira.
prescription.step2Desc: Geli xogahaaga hoose ka dibna taabo dir. WhatsApp ayaa laguu furi doonaa.
prescription.step3Desc: Farmasiyahankeenu wuxuu xaqiijin doonaa qoraalka oo uu kugu soo wargelin doonaa 30 daqiiqo gudahood.
prescription.formDesc: Buuxi xogahaaga ka dibna ku lifaaq qoraalkaaga.
prescription.name: Magacaaga
prescription.tapToSelect: Taabo si aad u doorato fayl
prescription.fileHint: JPG, PNG, ama PDF — ugu badnaan 10MB
prescription.notesPlaceholder: tusaale gaarsiinta degdeg ah, xasaasiyadda, tirada loo baahan yahay...
prescription.pharmacistNotice: Daawooyinka waxaa kaliya la siinayaa kadib markii farmashiyihu xaqiijiyo. Farmasiyahankeenna aqoonta u leh ayaa dib u eegi doona qoraalkaaga ka hor daawada diyaarinta.
prescription.redirectNoticeWithFile: WhatsApp ayaa laguugu furi doonaa — fadlan ku lifaaq faylka qoraalka chat-ka.
prescription.redirectNotice: Waxaad sidoo kale ku wadaagi kartaa qoraalkaaga si toos ah WhatsApp chat-ka.
prescription.noPrescrip: Qoraal dhakhtar ma haysatid? Helitaanka kaliya ayaad dooneysaa?
prescription.unsupportedFileDesc: Fadlan soo rar fayl JPG, PNG, ama PDF ah.
prescription.fileTooLarge: Faylku aad buu u weyn yahay
prescription.fileTooLargeDesc: Fadlan soo rar fayl ka yar 10MB.
prescription.requiredFields: Fadlan buuxi meelaha loo baahan yahay
prescription.requiredFieldsDesc: Magacaaga iyo lambarka taleefanka ayaa loo baahan yahay.
prescription.invalidPhoneDesc: Fadlan geli lambar taleefan sax ah.
prescription.attachHint: Fadlan ku lifaaq sawirka/PDF-ka qoraalka WhatsApp chat-ka.
prescription.shareHint: Waxaad ku wadaagi kartaa qoraalkaaga si toos ah WhatsApp chat-ka.

contact.subtitle: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.description: Su'aal ma qabtaa? Nala soo xiriir hab kasta oo kuwan ka mid ah.

inquiry.subtitle: Weydiin Daawad
inquiry.title: Daawad U Baahan Tahay?
inquiry.description: Buuxi faahfaahinta hoose waxaanan degdeg kugu xaqiijin doonaa helitaanka WhatsApp-ka.
inquiry.name: Magacaaga
inquiry.detailsPlaceholder: Faahfaahin dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan baahidaada...
inquiry.responseTime: Weydiintaada waxay furi doontaa WhatsApp oo faahfaahin hore loo buuxiyay. Badiyaa 30 daqiiqo gudahood ayaan uga jawaabnaa.

footer.tagline: Daawooyin Tayo Leh, Si Daacadnimo Leh Loo Siiyo. Farmashiyahaada xaafadda ee ku heellan daawooyin dhabta ah iyo daryeel naxariis leh.
footer.disclaimerText: Daawo walba waxaa kaliya la siinayaa kadib markii farmashiyihi xaqiijiyo. Daawooyin qoraal dhakhtar u baahan qoraal sax ah ayaa loo baahan yahay. Is-daweyntu way dhaawacaysaa — had iyo jeer la tasho daryeel-bixiyahaaga caafimaadka.
footer.copyright: © {{year}} Amilax Pharmaceuticals. Dhammaan xuquuqda way dhowran yihiin.

notFound.title: Bogga Lama Helin
notFound.description: Bogga aad raadinayso ma jiro ama waa la wareejiyay.
